about_the_game:
Welcome to the Fastest Fantasy Life Simulator! Get up to four friends and together you prepare for your fantasy life! On your way to adulthood you meet pesky lords, humorous dragons and friendly goblins. Every decision you make will determine the fate of your life. How will you decide? What does the future hold for you?

Features
  • Fast paced game designed for couch-coop-nights
  • Choices-Matter story events
  • You may tell a joke to a dragon
  • 80+ different story events to discover
  • 240+ different outcomes to discover
  • 40+ unique endings for your characters
Discover over 80 different story events and more than 40 different endings for your characters!

Please mind: If you want to play this game with your friends over the Internet, you have to use Steam Remote Play and only need to buy one copy.

name: Fastest Fantasy Life Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
